# **Inclusion/Exclusion**

```{r reading data, include=FALSE}

  mental_health_publications <- read_excel(paste0(mental_local_download$local_path), sheet = "African_authors_detailed_list (")%>%
  janitor::clean_names()

```


```{r distinct titles, include=FALSE}

mental_health_publications_distinct <- mental_health_publications%>%
  mutate(source_title = str_to_title(source_title) #
         ,source_title = gsub("\\.$", "", source_title) #Removing period at end of string
         )%>%
  distinct(source_title, .keep_all = TRUE)

```

```{r search criteria}

inclusion_words <- regex(paste(c("psychosis", "depression", "anxiety","depressive" , "depressed", "\\bsocial phobia\\b", "phobia",
                                 "\\bpanic disorder\\b", "agoraphobia",
                                 "\\bmental health disorders\\b","\\bmental disorders\\b", "\\bmental health disorder\\b","\\bmental disorder\\b",
                                 "\\bmental health problems\\b","\\bmental problems\\b", "\\bmental health problem\\b","\\bmental problem\\b",
                                 "\\bmental health illness\\b","\\bmental illness\\b", "\\bmental health conditions\\b"),
                               sep = "", collapse = '|'),
                                         ignore_case = TRUE)


longitudinal_words <- regex(paste(c("longitudinal", "\\bcohort study\\b", "\\bpanel study\\b"),  sep = "", collapse = '|'),
                                         ignore_case = TRUE)

review_words <- regex(paste(c("\\bsystematic review\\b", "\\bmeta\\b", "\\breview\\b", "\\bcase report\\b", "\\bcase reports\\b", 
                              "\\boverview\\b", "\\bliterature\\b"),  sep = "", collapse = '|'),
                                         ignore_case = TRUE)

randomized_trials_words <- regex(paste(c("placebo", "\\bdouble-blind\\b", "\\bdouble blind\\b", "\\bsingle-blind\\b", "\\bsingle blind\\b", 
                                         "\\brandomised controlled trial\\b", "\\brandomized controlled trial\\b", "randomised", "randomized",
                                         "randomization"), sep = "", collapse = '|'),
                                         ignore_case = TRUE)

psychosis_words <- regex(paste(c("psychosis"),  sep = "", collapse = '|'),
                                         ignore_case = TRUE)

depression_words <- regex(paste(c("depression","depressive" , "depressed"), sep = "", collapse = '|'),
                                         ignore_case = TRUE)

anxiety_words <- regex(paste(c("anxiety", "\\bsocial phobia\\b", "phobia", "\\bpanic disorder\\b", "agoraphobia"), 
                             sep = "", collapse = '|'),
                                         ignore_case = TRUE)

```


```{r inclusion data}

mental_health_publications_inclusion_final <- mental_health_publications_distinct%>%
  filter(str_detect(source_title, inclusion_words) |
         str_detect(source_fields_of_study, inclusion_words)
         )

```


```{r exclusion data}

mental_health_publications_exclusion_final <- mental_health_publications_distinct%>%
  filter(!str_detect(source_title, inclusion_words) &
         !str_detect(source_fields_of_study,  inclusion_words)
         )

```


```{r longitudinal cross sectional reviews Randomized trials}

longitudinal_publications_final <- mental_health_publications_inclusion_final%>%
  filter(str_detect(source_title, longitudinal_words) |
         str_detect(source_fields_of_study, longitudinal_words )
         )

randomized_trials_publications_final <- mental_health_publications_inclusion_final%>%
  filter(str_detect(source_title, randomized_trials_words) |
         str_detect(source_fields_of_study, randomized_trials_words ),
         !str_detect(source_title, longitudinal_words) &
         !str_detect(source_fields_of_study, longitudinal_words),
         )

reviews_publications_final <- mental_health_publications_inclusion_final%>%
  filter(str_detect(source_title, review_words) |
         str_detect(source_fields_of_study, review_words ),
         !str_detect(source_title, longitudinal_words) &
         !str_detect(source_fields_of_study, longitudinal_words),
         !str_detect(source_title, randomized_trials_words) &
         !str_detect(source_fields_of_study, randomized_trials_words)
         )

cross_sectional_publications_final <- mental_health_publications_inclusion_final%>%
  filter(!str_detect(source_title, longitudinal_words) &
         !str_detect(source_fields_of_study, longitudinal_words),
         !str_detect(source_title, review_words) &
         !str_detect(source_fields_of_study, review_words),
         !str_detect(source_title, randomized_trials_words) &
         !str_detect(source_fields_of_study, randomized_trials_words)
         )

```

# **QA/QC Data**

## Random Selection of Exclusion Data

```{r random selection}

#Select 10 random numbers 50 times
inclusion_data <- mental_health_publications_inclusion_final%>%
  mutate(number= 1:n())

exclusion_data <- mental_health_publications_exclusion_final%>%
  mutate(number= 1:n())


set.seed(1111)
exclusion_random <- as.data.frame(replicate(50, sample(exclusion_data$number, 10, replace=FALSE)))%>%
  pivot_longer(everything(), 
               names_to = "times",
    values_to = "random_number")%>%
  mutate(times = parse_number(times))%>%
  arrange(as.numeric(times))

inclusion_random <- as.data.frame(replicate(50, sample(inclusion_data$number, 10, replace=FALSE)))%>%
  pivot_longer(everything(), 
               names_to = "times",
    values_to = "random_number")%>%
  mutate(times = parse_number(times))%>%
  arrange(as.numeric(times))


exclusion_data_random <- exclusion_random%>%
  left_join(exclusion_data, by = c("random_number" = "number"))

inclusion_data_random <- inclusion_random%>%
  left_join(inclusion_data, by = c("random_number" = "number"))

```


